articles.author: Ben Schoon
articles.title: Oppo confirms Germany business is 'on hold' - 9to5Google
articles.description: In a statement, Oppo has confirmed its business in Germany is 'on hold' just a week after rumors of the company leaving Europe came out.
articles.content: Last week it came out that Oppo and OnePlus were planning a departure from much of Europe, and while Oppo isn’t confirming that, the company has just confirmed that its business in Germany is “on hol… [+2132 chars]

articles.title: NASA's Hubble Telescope Spots Mysterious Celestial Object 390 Million Light Years Away - NDTV
articles.description: According to a statement released by European Space Agency (ESA), 229-15 is one of those interesting celestial objects that fits several classifications.
articles.content:
ESA said that Z 229-15 is a galaxy, which is a gravitationally bound collection of stars.
